author: Emma Barrie
title: Lady Gaga, Danai Gurira, Charlize Theron, Natalie Portman Signed an Open Letter Supporting Girls’ Education
text: Every celebrity and their mother (not literally) has signed an open letter from campaigning and advocacy organization ONE to provide education to more than 130 million girls worldwide. Lady Gaga, Danai Gurira, Charlize Theron, and Natalie Portman are among those who are supporting the... More »
